import React from 'react' import { Card, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const SingleItem = ({item, openItem}) => { return ( {item.discount === true ? (
Save {item.price - item.discountPrice} € !

{item.price}€

) :

}

{item.name}

 ) } export default SingleItem
